alert.note: Alert for Onondaga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 10 at 3:29AM EST until December 11 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT... Rain changes to snow tonight. Additional lake effect snow showers on Monday. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph Monday. * WHERE...Onondaga county. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
